title: The Man Who Teaches Our Cops To Kill
itunes:title: The Man Who Teaches Our Cops To Kill
description:
Robert is joined by Jack O'Brien to discuss David Grossman, director of the Killology Research Group. More than a hundred police departments, and thousands of police officers, have taken Grossman’s courses over more than twenty years. 

FOOTNOTES:

  1. THE TRIGGER AND THE CHOICE: PART 1
  2. Non-Verbal Cues Are Easy to Misinterpret
  3. The Bulletproof Warrior
  4. “Are You Prepared to Kill Somebody?” A Day With One of America’s Most Popular Police Trainers
  5. Grossman Interview
  6. A day with ‘killology’ police trainer Dave Grossman
  7. Inside the School Teaching Cops When It’s OK to Kill
  8. Lt. Col. Dave Grossman, the “Killologist” Training America’s Cops
  9. One week playing violent video games alters brain activity
  10. The Evidence that Video Games Lead to Violence Is Weak
